::Havotron::
"Ahh, and I see you have some Nebulans. (nasty Little Creaturs)" he
said to himself the last part.  "We are not looking for anything.
First reason we go is because the Autobot force is sending a troop to
protect this measly planet and we beleive the Decepticon force there
is weak under the command of Megatron.  Second to rape the planet of
it's resources then to destroy it. Any other questions, Nebulans?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Spinister nodded again. The gun he was holding however latched off, and
> transformed into it's nebulan form. "You have not told us what we are
> looking for on the planet Havotron," the small creature asked. His arm
> cannon also unfolded and transformed. "Who cares, all we gotta do is
> kill the planet right?" said the other. Spinister just folded his arms.
